APIrequestsThroughJavascript_key1: Aapne browser ke through API service ko request bhejna seekha.
APIrequestsThroughJavascript_key2: Aajkal har bare company jo data pe kaam karte hain, unki apni API service hoti hai - jaise `YouTube`, Facebook, Twitter, Google (Google ki location API, translate API aur bahut saari doosri APIs hum aage extensively use karenge).
APIrequestsThroughJavascript_key3: Hum inn APIs ko apne website mein use kar sakte hain. Iske liye aapko Javascript ke through API request bhejne honge.
APIrequestsThroughJavascript_key4: Javascript ke through API request bhejne ke liye
APIrequestsThroughJavascript_key8: ye resources pe thora time[1 to 1:30 hour] spend kar sakte hain
APIrequestsThroughJavascript_key14: Iss project mein GeoLocation API use kar ke user ka current location pata kijiye
APIrequestsThroughJavascript_key15: Fir OpenWeather API use karke uss location ka weather apne `application` pe display kijiye.
